note.title: Conquer Britain
note.text: Capture as many strongholds as possible to force your enemies to surrender.

note.title: Agricola must survive
note.text: Gnaeus Julius Agricola must survive in order for Britain to be conquered.

note.title: Protect Londinium
note.text: The town of Londinium must not fall in enemy hands.

note.title: Senator Publius
note.text: Senator Publius is more than eager to help you. His services, however, come at a price. Should you decide to make use of his aid, just select him.

note.title: British chieftains
note.text: There are some enemy chieftains that roam near Londinium. Defeat their armies and they will join you along with their tribes.

note.title: Enemy shipyards
note.text: The British have some shipyards in their possession. Capture them to stop the constant arrival of enemy reinforcements.

note.title: Caves
note.text: It might be useful to use the caves to travel from one part of the island to another, because they allow you to attack the unsuspecting enemies from behind.

note.title: Stonehenge
note.text: If you bring your priests to this ancient Stonehenge, they will be able to perform powerful rituals that have an effect throughout the entire island.

note.title: Path to Stonehenge
note.text: This cave leads to the powerful Stonehenge where ancient rituals were performed. Should you take your priests there, you can make use of its power.

note.title: Mancunium
note.text: If you capture Mancunium, the archers defending the wall that divides the island in two will stop being a problem, as long as you control the city.

note.title: The enemy army
note.text: The barbarian Calgacus has amassed an enormous army and has set forth Londinium. Defeat him along with his army and Britain will be yours to control!
